Clip.Title: KENNEDY'S SUICIDE BOMBER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rare manuscripts, court documents and key eyewitnesses reveal the chilling and largely untold story of Richard Pavlick, who tried to kill President-Elect Kennedy in December 11th 1960, a month before Kennedy was sworn in as President.

Clip.Title: TIBET: MURDER IN THE SNOW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A Mountaineering Film Crew captures the shocking Murder of Tibetan refugees by the Chinese Military.

Clip.Title: THE HUNT FOR BIN LADEN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The inside story of the 20-year, billion dollar hunt for Osama bin Laden is revealed, featuring accounts from White House, intelligence, and military leaders involved in his capture.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: High above the Gulf of St. Lawrence, one of the East Coast's hidden wonders lies below - the Magdalene Islands - offering some of the region's top beaches, grassy hillsides and spectacular cliff faces.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A journey along Nova Scotia's Bay of Fundy coastline is a cultural and geological marvel - from historic Acadian Villages, to world-famous stone formations - rising from the sea.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: ASIA'S MONARCHIES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey to the heart of these beautiful lands to understand the relationship between the people and their monarchs.

Clip.Title: HITTITES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Chronicle the history of the Middle-Eastern civilization that existed alongside ancient Egypt for centuries.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: BC's inland waterways are a remote wonder - from Knight Inlet and Klinaklini glacier, to Rivers Inlet, and the rainforests surrounding Denny Island.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: THE LOCKERBIE BOMBING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Before 9/11, this 1988 bombing was the deadliest attack on American civilians. Reveal untold stories from eyewitness accounts and unique eyewitness footage.
